body: Here are definitions of some terms used in this section.
name: Definitions of Terms

sections.body: One of the standard eleven classes found in Classes.
sections.name: Core Class
sections.url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Classes/Prestige Classes/Definitions of Terms/Core Class

sections.body: Generally equal to the number of class levels (see below) in a spellcasting class. Some prestige classes add caster levels to an existing class.
sections.name: Caster Level

sections.body: The total level of the character, which is the sum of all class levels held by that character.
sections.name: Character Level
sections.url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Classes/Prestige Classes/Definitions of Terms/Character Level

sections.body: The level of a character in a particular class. For a character with levels in only one class, class level and character level are the same.
sections.name: Class Level
sections.url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Classes/Prestige Classes/Definitions of Terms/Class Level
